name: qa-genie
description: AI-driven QA automation agent that streamlines the entire QA pipeline

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "cd ai_service && python app.py" "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && (cd server && npm install) && (cd client && npm install)
